name: mikroe.click.rtc12
short_description: RTC 12 Click is a compact add-on board that measures the passage of time. This board features the DS1343, a low-current SPI-configurable real-time clock (RTC) from Maxim Integrated. This timekeeping device provides an extremely low standby current permitting longer life from a backup supply source. Its clock/calendar feature provides seconds, minutes, hours, day, date, month, and year information.
